channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Nexpose
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Nexpose

item.title: CVE-2017-5230|2024-08-05T14:55:35.711Z -- rapid7 -- nexpose
item.description: The Java keystore in all versions and editions of Rapid7 Nexpose prior to 6.4.50 is encrypted with a static password of 'r@p1d7k3y5t0r3' which is not modifiable by the user. The keystore provides storage for saved scan credentials in an otherwise secure location on disk.

item.title: CVE-2017-5232|2024-08-05T14:55:35.528Z -- rapid7 -- nexpose
item.description: All editions of Rapid7 Nexpose installers prior to version 6.4.24 contain a DLL preloading vulnerability, wherein it is possible for the installer to load a malicious DLL located in the current working directory of the installer.

item.title: CVE-2017-5264|2024-08-05T14:55:35.785Z -- rapid7 -- nexpose
item.description: Versions of Nexpose prior to 6.4.66 fail to adequately validate the source of HTTP requests intended for the Automated Actions administrative web application, and are susceptible to a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attack.
